title: kodconsu
author: kodconsu
content: I am delighted to introduce you to Lincoin, an innovative project that combines Artificial Intelligence (AI) and blockchain technology for a major technological revolution.Data centralization is coming to an end, and Lincoin aims to give users total control over their data. They will be able to choose to anonymously sell a portion of their data to the community as a whole, so that this information benefits everyone.Blockchain technology enables secure data sharing. By using distributed ledger technology, it creates a transparent and immutable record of data transactions, enhancing the reliability and integrity of shared data. This decentralized approach eliminates the need for a central authority or intermediary, thus reducing the risk of data breaches or unauthorized access.Lincoin also solves privacy issues related to data sharing. Through the integration of blockchain, network participants can retain control over their data, deciding how and when to share it. The use of encryption techniques, such as cryptographic hashing and asymmetric encryption, ensures that data remains confidential and accessible only to authorized parties. As a result, individuals and organizations can trust in the privacy and security of their valuable data assets.User control and selective access are fundamental principles of Lincoin. Within this framework, participants have the power to grant selective access to their data to AI models and other authorized parties. They retain ownership of their data and can define the terms and conditions of its use. Through smart contracts and consent mechanisms, participants can enforce granular permissions, ensuring that their data is shared only according to their preferences and requirements.The decentralized nature of blockchain and the implementation of privacy-preserving techniques create a robust infrastructure for data sharing in the AI ecosystem. This promotes collaboration, innovation, and the development of AI models while respecting participants' privacy rights and data control.Furthermore , Lincoin allows users to contribute to the creation and improvement of AI models and algorithms. Anonymously collected data can be used to train these models, improving their accuracy and ability to solve specific problems. For example, anonymous user data in the healthcare field can help improve medical diagnostics or predict the onset of certain diseases. This enables users to actively participate in AI development and benefit from the resulting technological advancements.Lincoin also offers an incentive mechanism to encourage users to share their data through an ERC20 token. Users can be rewarded with LCN tokens for contributing their data, creating an economic incentive to participate in the Lincoin ecosystem. These tokens can be used to access additional services, exchange AI models, or participate in governance activities within the network.Our vision is to create decentralized AI markets where individuals and organizations can collaborate, share data, exchange AI models, and drive innovation in a secure and transparent environment.Join us in this exciting adventure to unleash the potential of AI and blockchain, and together, we will shape the future of technology.To learn more about Lincoin, visit our official website: https://www.lincoin.org.You can also follow us on Twitter (https://twitter.com/lincoin2023), join our Telegram group (https://t.me/lincos), and consult our Whitepaper (https://whitepaper.lincoin.org/).And for those who wish to acquire the LCN token, you can find it on the Uniswap and PancakeSwap platforms.https://app.uniswap.org/#/swap?inputCurrency=0xc02aaa39b223fe8d0a0e5c4f27ead9083c756cc2&outputCurrency=0x5f90da089d90389323aefafdd4ce5b5d2f6cce7ehttps://pancakeswap.finance/swap?inputCurrency=0x5f90da089d90389323aefafdd4ce5b5d2f6cce7e&outputCurrency=0xbb4cdb9cbd36b01bd1cbaebf2de08d9173bc095c&chain=bscThank you for reading.Lincoin Teamhttps://bafybeiazynzryzklqin5cfi4x6odub4d4n4ca4ceexon7tp4vqpscv5mca.ipfs.dweb.link/logo-lincoin-250x250.png

comments.author: anders9
comments.body: Why is your team selling tokens? You literally just started the project and you've already sold? Seems promising.

comments.author: Sir_Cheer
comments.body: So hoq do you mine this thing? GPUs? CPUs? PoS? Anything?

comments.author: kodconsu
comments.body: Quote from: Sir_Cheer on July 29, 2023, 08:31:54 PMSo hoq do you mine this thing? GPUs? CPUs? PoS? Anything?Hello Sir_Cheer, thank you for your questions ! This is a erc20 token from ethereum blockchain, so you can not mine the token. We are working on ai data marketplace and ai model marketplace at this moment and some others projects. We are recruiting some people (remote and later locally) for marketing (on twitter, insta , youtube and crypto news) and development (frontend and backend, reactjs, react native, python, nodejs). Volunteers are welcome For 2024, we want to have also our own blockchain and we are working on architecture of our project. We are actually very busy to be ready for september. We hope that you find these answers helpful.Dev and Founder of Lincoin.org

comments.author: kodconsu
comments.body: Quote from: anders9 on July 29, 2023, 07:57:09 PMWhy is your team selling tokens? You literally just started the project and you've already sold? Seems promising.Hello,Sorry but we are not selling ours tokens. When we created the tokens, we also noticed very fast buys and sells of our tokens. After analysis, we concluded that they were bots. However, we have made a distribution of the number of tokens for the budget, marketing, etc. (see tokenomics from the official website). We are recruiting new marketing collaborators to improve transparency and communication about our project. I hope to have answered your doubts.Best regards.Founder and Dev.
